qpcr_fig — qpcr_fig
text: function generates Manhattan /Heatmap figure frequency eDNA data

title: qpcr_fig — qpcr_fig
code: qpcr_fig(   data,   manhattan = TRUE,   heatmap = TRUE,   ecoregion.select = NULL,   taxon.select = NULL,   species.select = NULL,   year = FALSE,   year.select = NULL,   x.axis = "MONTH",   title = NULL,   free.scale = c("fixed", "free"),   dashed.quartile = FALSE,   dotted.mean = TRUE,   color.palette = "viridis",   height.override = NULL,   width.override = NULL,   filename.prefix = NULL,   path.folder = NULL,   write.image = FALSE )

title: qpcr_fig — qpcr_fig
text: data (object). Data generated read_edna. manhattan (optional, logical). Generate manhattan plot. Default: manhattan = TRUE. heatmap (optional, logical). Generate heatmap plot. Default: heatmap = TRUE. ecoregion.select (optional, character, string) supplied, ecoregions data used. focus fewer ecoregions, list argument. Default: ecoregion.select = NULL. taxon.select (optional, character) Select one taxon. Available values: taxon.select = c("KINGDOM", "PHYLUM", "CLASS", "ORDER", "FAMILY", "GENUS", "SCIENTIFIC_NAME", "SPP"). default visualization generated taxon combined. Default: taxon.select = NULL. species.select (optional, character, string) supplied, species available data used. focus fewer species, select list species argument. name must taken column SPP, e.g. H. americanus. Default: species.select = NULL. year (optional, logical) display variable year figure. Default: year = FALSE. year.select (optional, integer, string) Select specific years display figure. Default, years available used, conditional year = TRUE enabled. Default: year.select = NULL. x.axis (optional, character) default x axis display variable month. Using x.axis = "SPP", trigger function display facet grid species x-axis ecoregions using months combined. Default: x.axis = "MONTH". title (optional, character) Title print top figure. default title displayed. e.g. title = "Manhattan plot qPCR data months ecoregions". Default: title = NULL. free.scale (required, character) scale free fixed. Available values: free.scale = c("fixed", "free"). dashed.quartile (optional, logical) Display Q25 Q75 manhattan plot. Default: dashed.quartile = FALSE. dotted.mean (optional, logical) Display mean frequency detection manhattan plot. Default: dotted.mean = TRUE. color.palette (optional, character) Change default color palette. Available options : "viridis", ggplot2 basic colors: "basic" ColorBrewer scales using "brewer". Default: color.palette = "viridis". height.override (optional, integer) Override height plot. Default: height.override = NULL. width.override (optional, integer) Override width plot. Default: width.override = NULL. filename.prefix (optional, character) Filename prefix. Default: filename.prefix = NULL. path.folder (optional, character) Default: path.folder = NULL. Default use working directory. write.image (optional, logical) Write figure path.folder. Default: write.image = FALSE.

title: read_edna — read_edna
text: Function read several MS Excel files found specified folder. qpcr = TRUE, function search MS Excel files qPCR_data name. reads metadata (sheet 2) samples (sheet 3). Merge together based EVENT_ID.

title: read_edna — read_edna
text: path.folder (optional, character) Default: path.folder = NULL. Default use working directory. qpcr (optional, logical) Read qPCR data. Default: qpcr = TRUE.

title: read_edna — read_edna
text: tidy dataframe (tibble) 15 columns: PROJECT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, DATA_QPCR_FILES: added internally keep track files origins, METADATA_QPCR_FILES: added internally keep track files origins, ECOREGION, KINGDOM, PHYLUM, CLASS, ORDER, FAMILY, GENUS, SCIENTIFIC_NAME: e.g.: Homarus americanus, SPP: e.g.: H. americanus, YEAR, MONTH, DETECTED

title: read_edna — read_edna
text: function looks MS Excel files qPCR_data filename. sheet 2 (metadata information), required read columns : "projectID", "sampleID", "eventID", "ecoregion", "samplingSite", "eventDate". sheet 2 (samples results), required read columns : "eventID", "scientificName", "kingdom", "phylum", "class", "order", "family", "genus", "occurrenceStatus".

title: read_edna — read_edna
text: Thierry Gosselin thierrygosselin@icloud.com Melissa Morrison Melissa.Morrison@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
